name: .WKDOWNLOAD
summary: Learn about .WKDOWNLOAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To resume the paused download a WKDOWNLOAD file represents, double-click the file with GNOME Epiphnay (Linux) installed.

If you cannot resume your download, you may still be able to recover the partially-downloaded file your WKDOWNLOAD file contains. To do so, rename the .wkdownload extension to the actual extension of the file you were downloading. Then, attempt to open the renamed file with an appropriate program.
